shortDescription: I am a software engineer specialized in building scalable backend systems and web. I also dabble in a little bit of frontend. Currently, I am working at Amazon as a Software Developer Engineer.
aboutMe: Hi, I am Darsh Patel currently studying in University of Southern California with 3.8/4.0 GPA. I am currently working at University of Southern California as a Web Developer. I like to play Chess as hobby.
